CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mydb.page_view
USING parquet
COMMENT 'This is the staging page view table'
LOCATION '/user/external/page_view'
TBLPROPERTIES ('p1'='v1', 'p2'='v2')
AS SELECT * FROM src

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mydb.page_view
USING parquet
LOCATION '/user/external/page_view'
COMMENT 'This is the staging page view table'
TBLPROPERTIES ('p1'='v1', 'p2'='v2')
AS SELECT * FROM src

CREATE TABLE my_tab (a INT, b STRING, ts TIMESTAMP) USING parquet
PARTITIONED BY (
    a,
    bucket(16, b),
    years(ts),
    months(ts),
    days(ts),
    hours(ts),
    foo(a, "bar", 34))

CREATE TABLE table_name USING json
OPTIONS (a 1, b 0.1, c TRUE)
CREATE TABLE 1m.2g(a INT)
CREATE TABLE 1m.2g(a INT) USING parquet
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS my_tab(a INT, b STRING) USING parquet

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS INPUTFORMAT 'inFormat' OUTPUTFORMAT 'outFormat'

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS INPUTFORMAT 'inFormat' OUTPUTFORMAT 'outFormat'
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'customSerde'

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS otherFormat
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS otherFormat
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'customSerde'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ('prop'='value')

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS parquet

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS rcfile
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'customSerde'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ('prop'='value')

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS sequencefile
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'customSerde'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ('prop'='value')

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS textfile
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' ESCAPED BY '\\' -- double escape for Scala and for SQL
COLLECTION ITEMS TERMINATED BY '#'
MAP KEYS TERMINATED BY '='
LINES TERMINATED BY '\n'

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint)
PARTITIONED BY (part string)
STORED AS textfile
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'customSerde'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ('prop'='value')
CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint) PARTITIONED BY (part string)
CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint) SKEWED BY (id) ON (1,2,3)

STORED BY 'handler'

CREATE TABLE my_tab (id bigint, p1 string) PARTITIONED BY (p2 string, truncate(p1, 16))

USING parquet
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','

USING parquet
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'customSerde'

USING parquet
STORED AS parquet
